definition: A term used to describe something that has the potential to save lives or prevent a life-threatening situation. It is commonly used to refer to actions, measures, or objects that are crucial in emergency situations or critical moments.

examples.german: Das schnelle Eingreifen der Sanitäter war lebensrettend.
examples.english: The quick intervention of the paramedics was life-saving.

examples.german: Die lebensrettende Operation war ein großer Erfolg.
examples.english: The life-saving surgery was a great success.

examples.german: Seine lebensrettenden Maßnahmen haben viele Menschenleben gerettet.
examples.english: His life-saving measures saved many lives.

examples.german: Die lebensrettende Ausrüstung ist in Notfällen unverzichtbar.
examples.english: The life-saving equipment is indispensable in emergencies.

examples.german: Die lebensrettende Wirkung des Medikaments wurde wissenschaftlich bestätigt.
examples.english: The life-saving effect of the medication has been scientifically confirmed.
